meanings.definition: A place where aquatic animals or plants are raised for commercial purposes.
meanings.sent1: The aquafarms in our town provide fresh fish to the local market.
meanings.sent2: Visiting aquafarms can be an educational experience for children.
meanings.sent3: The aquafarms had a party, and all the fish were invited!
meanings.sent4: The aquafarms were a bustling underwater city of activity.
meanings.sent5: The aquafarms shimmered under the sunlight, a sea of life and growth.

meanings.definition: To cultivate aquatic animals or plants for commercial purposes.
meanings.sent1: Farmers aquafarms various types of seafood to sell at the market.
meanings.sent2: It takes dedication and hard work to aquafarms successfully.
meanings.sent3: She decided to aquafarms her own oyster garden in the backyard pond.
meanings.sent4: The company aims to aquafarms sustainably and protect the marine environment.
meanings.sent5: The team worked tirelessly to aquafarms the best quality shrimp in the region.
